overview: A hitman task to do whatever his boss tells him, he does this to repay his father from all the sacrifices he had done for him but his victims won't leave him in his dreams causing him to get paranoid even at his work they still haunt him. Their crimes had been on the radio and social media where someone had taken a video and posted. Day after day he gets scared of what may happen to him. Will his nightmare stop now that his inside bars or will they still haunt him for the rest of his life?
title: Paralisado
